Articles.Content:
Hello guys and girls!

I recently discovered the KSP forums in the last few weeks after searching for various mods, and after quite a bit of lurking, decided to bite the bullet and sign up. I mean, I figured you lot don't bite. Unless you're the Space Kraken in disguise. Hmmnn....

I only found out about KSP in the last month or so, and shamelessly since then I've been hooked! Many people love the game for the way it presents a challenge whilst still being fun to play; and that's certainly been true for me. As far as achievements go, being able to land on the Mun and Minmus, being able to achieve various orbits around Kerbin and the two aforementioned moons, and inadvertently sending a Mun mission into Kerbol orbit are my only claims to fame! Interplantery missions, rendezvousing, and some aspects of spaceplanes still baffle me for now, but I'm oping to learn!

A bit about me: I'm a normal guy from London, Havering specifically if any of you happen to know the city. As for the badgers, well, I'd imagine that if badgers existed on Kerbin, the Kerbals would've sent a fair few into space by now - because what animal could be more useful for observing the effects of space on biology? Besides, who knows, Kerbals may have evolved from badgers....somehow. (Getting ready to banned for blasphemy)

Well, I've wittered on for long enough now.... here's to many happy hours discussing KSP!

Hello there and welcome to our community

Good luck to your Kerbals, stranded or not they're gonna have fun anyways...
